event.title: FSFE Assembly at the Chaos Communication Congress in Hamburg
event.body: Fellows, friends and supporters of the FSFE can join during an assembly at the CCC. Located in the “Noisy Square”, there will be a session each day at 2pm: Android security and privacy with Free Software / A session on encryption using the Fellowship Smartcard with GnuPG main developer and FSFE cofounder Werner Koch / Free Your Android session.
